description: You can play the games 'Boxes', 'Connect Four', 'Tic Tac Toe' and 'Responsiveness' against all your friends. The first three games can be played online, against other players who bought the application (multiplayer). But of course it's also possible to play it on one phone with your friends. That way you'll have hours of fun playing the included games! You can play with up to four player in 'Responsiveness'! Look at the screenshots and video to get an impression of the game pack. NOTE: INTERNET IS REQUIRED, even for the offline games.
